howItWorks.title: How the ONLY-ONE-PROMPT SYSTEM works:
steps: Enter your request in the text field
Copy the generated text with the Copy button
Paste it into an online LLM (e.g., ChatGPT, Claude)
Follow the instructions from the LLM

howToUse.title: How to use the IrsanAI - LRP Document:
items: Copy the generated Markdown code into your online LLM (ChatGPT, Claude, etc.)
Execute all steps that the LLM instructs you to do
Important: The LLM will ask for confirmation of understanding before generating code
For hardware dependencies: First run IrsanAI_OS_HW_Detector.py locally
For errors: Use IrsanAI_report.json for incremental updates
howToUse.important: Important: This system makes NO AUTONOMOUS DECISIONS anymore - the LLM analyzes the request itself!

warning.title: Important:
warning.text: This tool does not generate code solutions directly. It only creates the IrsanAI - LRP Document that you must send to an online LLM.
